scriptmodule.description: Click color by label. This module contains also a very strong wait setup so that it takes care that the interaction really has finished before continuing.

parameter.name: breadcrumbRefinementValueCount
parameter.desc: How many refinement values should we have in the breadcrumb after this action

command.name: storeEval
command.comment: We need a lowercase value of the string for the class selector later.

command.name: storeAttribute
command.comment: We get us the value of the class because it will change during the click process and hence we can wait until it changed to make sure the page finished doing all the magic.

command.name: waitForNotAttribute
command.comment: Wait until the class changed its value.

command.name: waitForElementCount
command.comment: Make also sure the breadbrumbs change.
